column2: "Sɛ wohu obi a woeku no da haban mu
column3: wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ fa no do
column4: na wonnyim nyia okum no a:"

column2: "ɔno wo mpanyimfo nye wo atsɛmbufo mfir edzi
column3: na wonkosusu nkodu nkurow a etwa ehyia nyia woeku no no ho no do:"

column2: "na ɔmbra dɛ
column3: kurow a ɔbɛn nyimpa a woeku no no nkyɛn no
column4: mekyerɛ kurow no mu mpanyimfo no mfa anantwikuw mu ɔnantwiber a wɔmmfaa no nnyɛɛ edwuma

column2: "ɔnantwiber no nsian nkɔ ɔbɔn a nsu pem wɔ do a wɔnndɔwee na wonnduaa mu adze mu
column3: na wombu ɔnantwiber no no kɔn wɔ ɔbɔn no mu:"

column2: "na Levi mbabanyin asɔfo no mbra ho; na hɔn na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn asan mu eyi hɔn dɛ wɔnsom no
column3: na wonhyira wɔ EWURADZE ne dzin mu; na hɔn anomu asɛm do na wɔmfa ndzi ɔham biara nye ɔbɔ biara ho asɛm:"

column2: "na kurow no mu mpanyimfo a wɔbɛn nyimpa a woku no no
column3: nhohor hɔn nsa ho ngu ɔnantwiber a wobuu no kɔn mu wɔ ɔbɔn no mu no do:"

column2: "na wombua nse dɛ
column3: Nnyɛ hɛn nsa bi kaa bɔgya gui

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: fa fir wo man Israel a apon hɔn no
column4: na mma bɔgya a onndzi so nnka wo man Israel mu. Na bɔgya no wɔdze bɛkyɛ hɔn."

column2: "Ama eeyi bɔgya a onndzi so no efi wo mu
column3: aber a ereyɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do no."

column2: "Sɛ itu sa nye w'atamfo kɔko
column3: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn yi hɔn hyɛ wo nsa
column6: "na ihu ndɔmmum no mu ɔbaa fɛɛfɛw bi
column8: na epɛ dɛ efa no yɛ wo yer a;"

column2: "ɔno fa no bra fie; na onyi ne tsir na ombubu n'awerɛw;"
"na onyi no ndɔmmum akataho no mfi noho
column3: na ɔnka wo fie
column4: na ongyam n'egya nye ne na bosoom ara mu: na n'ekyir no akɔ ne nkyɛn

column2: "Na ɔmbra dɛ
column3: sɛ emmpɛ no a
column4: ɔno ma ɔnkɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔpɛ; na ɔtɔn dze
column6: mma nnye no nndzi dɛ afonabaa

column2: "Sɛ ɔbanyin bi wɔ yernom beenu na
column3: ɔdɔ kor
column5: na hɔn beenu no nyina awowo mba ama no; na sɛ abakan no nye nyia ɔtan no ne babanyin a:"

column2: "ɔno ɔmbra dɛ
column3: da a ɔkyɛ n'adze a ɔwɔ mu ma ne mbabanyin no mma ɔmmfa nyia ɔdɔ no no ne babanyin nnyɛ abakan nndzi nyia ɔtan no ne babanyin a ɔyɛ abakan no enyim:"

column2: "mbom ɔngye abakan no nto mu
column3: nyia ɔtan no no ne babanyin no
column4: ɔmma no dza ɔwɔ nyinara mu kyɛfa mbɔho ebien: na ɔno nye n'ahoɔdzen ahyɛse; abakan ndzinoa yɛ nedze."

column2: "Sɛ nyimpa wɔ babanyin ɔsoɔdzennyi nye etuatsewnyi a onntsie n'egya ne ndze
column3: anaa ne na ne ndze

column2: "ɔno n'egya nye ne na nkyer no
column3: na wɔmfa no mfir edzi nkɔ no kurow mu mpanyimfo nkyɛn wɔ no kuropon ano;"

column2: "na wɔnse no kurow no mu mpanyimfo no dɛ
column3: Hɛn babanyin yi yɛ ɔsoɔdzennyi nye otuatsewnyi

column2: "Na no kurow no mu mbanyin nyinara nsiw no abo
column3: ma ɔntɔ: ama eeyi mbusu no efi wo mu; na Israel nyinara ntse

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa bi yɛ bɔn a ɔsɛ owu
column3: na woku no
column4: na edze no sɛn dua bi do a;"

column2: "mma ne nyimpadua no nnka dua no do anadwe no nyinara
column3: na osie na sie no da no ara; na nyia wɔasɛn no no Nyame apa no; amma eenngu w'asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze no ho fi."
